Made For: General Assembly UXD
Made With: Omnigraffle
Date: Spring 2014
Github: Download
Overview: Fully clickable prototype utilizing omnigraffle actions tab. Proposed solution based upon competetive analysis of GWU and Harvard U course catalogs. Feedback also garnered from user interviews regarding use of competetor's solutions.

Overview: Fully funtional prototype of several UI enhancements to the original Labelbox mobile application. Made in Tumult Hype with embedded javscript.

Overview: UX teardown of ebay's interations, within a commerce context. Wires were done in omnigraffle, with the PDF export available on github.
